name: metric-crud-app-backend
description: Small rest api backend for metric-crud-app example

scripts.docker:build: docker-compose build && docker-compose run --rm api npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.docker:dev:build: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml build  && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm api npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.docker:test:build: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm api npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.docker:test:integration: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm api npx jest --watchAll --detectOpenHandles  --testPathPattern=/test/integration
scripts.docker:test:all: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm api npx jest --watchAll --detectOpenHandles  --testPathPattern=/test/
